comment.author: Kaitlin
comment.text: I am a DEPLORABLE in PA, can not wait to vote to make AMERICA Great again this Tuesday!!!!! Better wake up people before its to late, she will give our country away to the highest bidder!! Everyone knows it, even the people that support her. TRUMP TRAIN!!!!!!!
